pages.text: $(bred)Bobsle Team$() often generated in places with snow or ice.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)60$()$(br)$(bred)Damage$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Very Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It will quickly damaged when move on block without $(baqua)snow or ice$(), and its passengers will get off and attack independently.$(bred)it won't be cold or frozen or butter$().
